name: 狄雅南
objective:
本課程旨在教導學生瞭解各類化工程序模式的建立以及其求解的方法。內容包括：輸送動態方程式之建立，線性、非線性、矩陣、微分方程等之轉換及求解。
The goal of process simulation is to develop numerical analysis techniques that allow students to simulate the behavior of a chemical process. The contents involving：the development of dynamic equations of transport, the transformations and solutions of linear, nonlinear matrix, and differential equations.
schedule:
1st week : Concept of Process Design and Simulation
2nd week: Introduction of process design
3rd week : Thermodynamics (properties and regression) 
4th week : Process simulation 
5th week : Practical simulations
6th week : Practical simulations
7th week : Practical simulations
8th week : Progress Presentation 
9th week : Process Synthesis and Energy Integration
10th week:  Introduction of process synthesis and energy integration
11th week: Unit operations (distillation, reactive distillation, heat exchanger, reactor, vessel, pump) and Steam and cooling water systems
12th week: Engineering Economics and Optimization 
13th week: Engineering Economics and Optimization
14th week: Economic decision and cost diagram
15th week: Preliminary cost and cost data
16th week: Final Presentation
17th week: Review
18th week: Final Project Report

3. Peters, Max S., Plant Design and Economics for Chemical Engineers, McGraw Hill, 2004.
4. Luyben, William L.; Tyreus, Bjorn D.; Luyben, Michael L.; Plantwide Process Control, McGraw-Hill, 1998.
